SamPy.resolve.misc.basicReduction.SOARReduction¶

class SamPy.resolve.misc.basicReduction.SOARReduction(logfile='reduction.log')¶

This class provides basic data reduction steps for SOAR image slicer data.

__init__(logfile='reduction.log')¶

Init

Methods

__init__([logfile]) Init
divideWithFlat(filelist[, ext, flatFile]) Divides with the normalized flat
findBiases([identifier]) Finds all bias frames
findFlats([identifier]) Finds all flat frames and writes a file listing the files.
findNes([identifier, outfile]) Finds all Neon exposures and outputs them to a file.
findNonBiasFrames([exclude]) Finds all FITS files that don’t have the bias identifier in them
findScienceFrames([identifier, outfile]) Finds all science exposures and outputs them to a file.
makeBias([combine, biaslist, output]) Combines the bias frames to a single bias frame.
makeFlat([combine, flatlist, output]) Combines the flat field frames to a single flat frame.
normalizeFlat([filename, output, nodes, ...]) Normalizes the flat in a very crude way.
renameUnusedFiles([PARAM20, PARAM21, PARAM22]) Renames all fits files from the directory which have been taken with different readout mode than the usual image slicer data.
subtractBias(filelist[, ext, biasFile]) Subtracts the bias from the filelist
subtractOverscan(filelist[, ext]) Subtracts the overscan region from each file in the filelist.
